name: tendril cowl
sizes_available: adult once-around small (adult once-around large, adult twice-around)
notes:
materials

- 1 (2, 3) skein(s) of purl soho’s [hedgerow][1], 93% merino, 3.5% cashmere, and 3.5% mulberry silk. each skein is approximately 243 yards/ 100 grams; approximately 235 (295, 640) total yards required. we used the color forest clover.
- us 7 (4.5 mm), 16-, 24-, or 32-inch [circular needles][2], depending on size you are making
- [stitch markers][3], including one unique
- a [cable stitch holder][4]

gauge
20 stitches and 30 rounds = 4 inches in stockinette stitch

24 stitches and 28 rounds = 4 inches in stitch pattern

sizes
adult once-around small (adult once-around large, adult twice-around)

- finished height: 11¾ inches high
- finished circumference: 20 (25, 55) inches

sample: the cowl shown here is the adult once-around small.


designed by purl soho designer, [gaby bush][5].
